verses.roman:
vipra-gṛhe āsi' prabhu nibhṛte vasilā
śrī-rūpa-vallabha duṅhe āsiyā mililā

synonyms: vipra-gṛhe—to the house of that brāhmaṇa; āsi'-coming; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nibhṛte—in a solitary place; vasilā—sat down; śrī-rūpa-vallabha—the two brothers Rūpa Gosvāmī and Śrī Vallabha; duṅhe—both of them; āsiyā—coming; mililā—met Him.
translation: While Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was sitting in a solitary place in the home of that Deccan brāhmaṇa, Rūpa Gosvāmī and Śrī Vallabha [Anupama Mallika] came to meet Him.
